    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1254</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sukkot: The Land of Israel and Rain1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sukkot: Das Land von Israel und von Rain1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sukkot : La terre de l'Israel et du Rain1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sukkot: A terra de Israel e de Rain1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sukkot: La terra dell'Israele e di Rain1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sukkot: Το έδαφος του Ισραήλ και Rain1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sukkot: La pista de Israel y de Rain1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners learn about the importance of rain for The Land of Israel and examine the reasons for saying mashiv haruach umorid hageshem beginning on Sukkot.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Land of Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mashiv haruach umorid hageshem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sukkot.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger erlernen über den Wert des Regens für
das Land von Israel und überprüfen die Gründe für das Sagen des 
mashiv haruach umorid hageshem, das auf Sukkot anfängt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants se renseignent sur l'importance de
la pluie pour la terre de l'Israel et examinent les raisons de dire le
hageshem d'umorid de haruach de mashiv commençant sur Sukkot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners aprendem sobre a importância da 
chuva para a terra de Israel e examinam as razões para dizer o 
hageshem do umorid do haruach do mashiv que começa em Sukkot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti imparano circa l'importanza di 
pioggia per la terra dell'Israele ed esaminano i motivi per dire il 
hageshem del umorid del haruach del mashiv che comincia su Sukkot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι μαθαίνουν για τη σημασία της βροχής για το
έδαφος του Ισραήλ και εξετάζουν τους λόγους για mashiv 
haruach umorid hageshem την αρχή σε Sukkot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes aprenden sobre la importancia 
de la lluvia para la pista de Israel y examinan las razones de decir 
el hageshem del umorid del haruach del mashiv que comienza por Sukkot.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land von Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
